comment: Uses D2L for all assignments. Responses can be lengthy but they are all pretty straight forward. Quizzes are weird but she usually gives you two attempts.

Very easy class. Online quizzes on D2L. 3 MANDATORY plays you must buy tickets for/see, then answer reflection essays for. 100s on all mine- pay attention and answer the ?s. Need the textbook, some quizzes are from there. Books to read I was able to find online so didn't buy them. No final, just play you have to write/perform. She's nice/helpful.

She grades the final reflection essay to harshly, especially for a gen ed class. You would think that this class would not be that hard considering it is a gen ed, but it's not. Quizzes are easy, but essays and discussions are long and she grades them too harshly. DO NOT TAKE HER.
Essay questions are long and she doesn't give a very good rubric or description of what she wants.
Really easy class. But shes very disorganized and often times just rambles on about her personal life. She also quite frequently forgets to actually put the quizzes on D2L
Professor Gossett's class is extremely easy. However, her overall disorganization and unstable emotions can be kind of annoying.
